name: garbaking-pos
description: Modern offline-first Point of Sale system for restaurants

scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:frontend: cd frontend/admin-pos && npm install && cd ../customer-app && npm install && cd ../kds-app && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:customer" "npm run dev:kds"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/admin-pos && npm run build && cd ../customer-app && npm run build && cd ../kds-app && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend/admin-pos && npm test && cd ../customer-app && npm test && cd ../kds-app && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend/admin-pos && npm run lint && cd ../customer-app && npm run lint && cd ../kds-app && npm run lint

author: Garbaking Team
